mc.name: Kird Ape
mc.oracleText: Kird Ape gets +1/+2 as long as you control a Forest.
mc.printedText: Kird Ape gets +1/+2 as long as you control a forest.

mc.name: Clockwork Avian
mc.oracleText:
Flying
Clockwork Avian comes into play with four +1/+0 counters on it.
Clockwork Avian can't have more than four +1/+0 counters on it.
At end of combat, if Clockwork Avian attacked or blocked this turn, remove a +1/+0 counter from it.
{X}, {T}: Put X +1/+0 counters on Clockwork Avian. Play this ability only during your upkeep.
mc.printedText:
Clockwork Avian comes into play with four +1/+0 counters on it.
Clockwork Avian can't have more than four +1/+0 counters on it.

{X}, {T}: Put X +1/+0 counters on Clockwork Avian. Play this ability only during your upkeep.

mc.name: Sengir Vampire
mc.oracleText:
Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)
Whenever a creature dealt damage by Sengir Vampire this turn is put into a graveyard, put a +1/+1 counter on Sengir Vampire.
mc.printedText:
Flying
Whenever a creature dealt damage by Sengir Vampire this turn is put into a graveyard, put a +1/+1 counter on Sengir Vampire.

mc.name: Mahamoti Djinn
mc.oracleText: Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)
mc.printedText: Flying
mc.flavorText: Of royal blood among the spirits of the air, the Mahamoti djinn rides on the wings of the winds. As dangerous in the gambling hall as he is in battle, he is a master of trickery and misdirection.

mc.name: Force of Nature
mc.oracleText:
Trample (If this creature would deal enough combat damage to its blockers to destroy them, you may have it deal the rest of its damage to defending player.)
At the beginning of your upkeep, Force of Nature deals 8 damage to you unless you pay {G}{G}{G}{G}.
mc.printedText:
Trample
At the beginning of your upkeep, Force of Nature deals 8 damage to you unless you pay {G}{G}{G}{G}.

mc.name: Shambling Strider
mc.oracleText: {R}{G}: Shambling Strider gets +1/-1 until end of turn.
mc.printedText: {R}{G}: Shambling Strider gets +1/-1 until end of turn.
mc.flavorText: Freyalise forbid that any stranger should wander into the striders' territory.

mc.name: Diabolic Vision
mc.oracleText: Look at the top five cards of your library. Put one of them into your hand and the rest on top of your library.
mc.printedText: Look at the top five cards of your library. Put one of them into your hand and the rest on top of your library in any order.
mc.flavorText:
"I have seen the true path. I will not warm myself by the fire--I will become the flame."
--Lim-Dul, the Necromancer

mc.name: Quirion Elves
mc.oracleText:
As Quirion Elves comes into play, choose a color.
{T}: Add {G} to your mana pool.
{T}: Add one mana of the chosen color to your mana pool.
mc.printedText:
As Quirion Elves comes into play, choose a color.
{T}: Add {G} to your mana pool.
{T}: Add one mana of the chosen color to your mana pool.

mc.name: Tar Pit Warrior
mc.oracleText: When Tar Pit Warrior becomes the target of a spell or ability, sacrifice it.
mc.printedText: When Tar Pit Warrior becomes the target of a spell or ability, sacrifice Tar Pit Warrior.
mc.flavorText:
"The cyclops shrugged off savage blows, but casual insults made him weep."
--Azeworai, "The Cyclops who Couldn't"

mc.name: Impulse
mc.oracleText: Look at the top four cards of your library. Put one of them into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library.
mc.printedText: Look at the top four cards of your library. Put one of them into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library.
mc.flavorText:
"Controlling time ensures you need never look impulsive again."
--Teferi

mc.name: Clockwork Beast
mc.oracleText:
Clockwork Beast comes into play with seven +1/+0 counters on it.
At end of combat, if Clockwork Beast attacked or blocked this turn, remove a +1/+0 counter from it.
{X}, {T}: Put up to X +1/+0 counters on Clockwork Beast. This ability can't cause the total number of +1/+0 counters on Clockwork Beast to be greater than seven. Play this ability only during your upkeep.

Clockwork Beast comes into play with seven +1/+0 counters on it.
Clockwork Beast can't have more than seven +1/+0 counters on it.

{X}, {T}: Put X +1/+0 counters on Clockwork Beast. Play this ability only during your upkeep.

mc.name: Drain Life
mc.oracleText:
Spend only black mana on X.

Drain Life deals X damage to target creature or player. You gain life equal to the damage dealt, but not more life than the player's life total before Drain Life dealt damage or the creature's toughness.
mc.printedText:
Spend only black mana on {X}.
Drain Life deals X damage to target creature or player. You gain life equal to the damage dealt, but not more life than the player's life total before Drain Life dealt damage or the creature's toughness.

mc.name: Leviathan
mc.oracleText:
Trample
Leviathan comes into play tapped and doesn't untap during your untap step.
At the beginning of your upkeep, you may sacrifice two Islands. If you do, untap Leviathan.
Leviathan can't attack unless you sacrifice two Islands.
mc.printedText:
Trample
Leviathan comes into play tapped and doesn't untap during your untap step.
At the beginning of your upkeep, you may sacrifice two islands. If you do, untap Leviathan.
Leviathan can't attack unless you sacrifice two islands.

mc.name: Ball Lightning
mc.oracleText:
Trample (If this creature would deal enough damage to its blockers to destroy them, you may have it deal the rest of its damage to defending player or planeswalker.)
Haste (This creature can attack and {T} as soon as it comes under your control.)
At the beginning of the end step, sacrifice Ball Lightning.
mc.printedText:
Trample; haste (This creature may attack and {T} the turn it comes under your control.)
At end of turn, sacrifice Ball Lightning.

mc.name: Fireball
mc.oracleText:
Fireball deals X damage divided evenly, rounded down, among any number of target creatures and/or players.
As an additional cost to play Fireball, pay {1} for each target beyond the first.
mc.printedText: Fireball deals X damage divided evenly, rounded down, among Y plus one target creatures and/or players.

mc.name: Shivan Dragon
mc.oracleText:
Flying
{R}: Shivan Dragon gets +1/+0 until end of turn.
mc.printedText:
Flying
{R}: Shivan Dragon gets +1/+0 until end of turn.
mc.flavorText: While it's true most dragons are cruel, the Shivan dragon seems to take particular glee in the misery of others, often tormenting its victims much like a cat plays with a mouse before delivering the final blow.

mc.name: Svyelunite Temple
mc.oracleText:
Svyelunite Temple comes into play tapped.

{T}: Add {U} to your mana pool.

{T}, Sacrifice Svyelunite Temple: Add {U}{U} to your mana pool.

{T}: Add {U} to your mana pool.
{T}, Sacrifice Svyelunite Temple: Add {U}{U} to your mana pool.

mc.name: Hulking Cyclops
mc.oracleText: Hulking Cyclops can't block.
mc.printedText: Hulking Cyclops can't block.
mc.flavorText: Anyone can get around a cyclops, but few can stand in its way.

mc.name: Cloud Djinn
mc.oracleText:
Flying
Cloud Djinn can block only creatures with flying.
mc.printedText:
Flying
Cloud Djinn can block only creatures with flying.
mc.flavorText:
As elusive as the footprint of a djinn
--Suq'Ata expression

mc.name: Bloodrock Cyclops
mc.oracleText: Bloodrock Cyclops attacks each turn if able.
mc.printedText: Bloodrock Cyclops attacks each turn if able.
mc.flavorText:
"He's big an' dumb an' ready to fight. A lot like ol' Hornhead here."
--Squee, goblin cabin hand,
scouting report

mc.name: Giant Crab
mc.oracleText: {U}: Giant Crab gains shroud until end of turn. (It can't be the target of spells or abilities.)
mc.printedText: {U}: Giant Crab can't be the target of spells or abilities this turn.
mc.flavorText: During the giant crabs' mating season, Skyshroud nights are filled with the clatter of their skirmishes.

mc.name: Segmented Wurm
mc.oracleText: Whenever Segmented Wurm becomes the target of a spell or ability, put a -1/-1 counter on it.
mc.printedText: Whenever Segmented Wurm becomes the target of a spell or ability, put a -1/-1 counter on it.
mc.flavorText:
"If only we could so easily leave behind those parts of ourselves that pain us."
--Crovax

mc.name: Death Stroke
mc.oracleText: Destroy target tapped creature.
mc.printedText: Destroy target tapped creature.
mc.flavorText: For a sharp second, Selenia froze, and Crovax's blade found home, As the angel shattered like glass, Crovax felt his mind collapse--the curse had been fulfilled.

mc.name: Yavimaya Wurm
mc.oracleText: Trample
mc.printedText: Trample
mc.flavorText: When the gorilla playfully grabbed the wurm's tail, the wurm doubled back and playfully ate the gorilla's head.

mc.name: Dark Ritual
mc.oracleText: Add {B}{B}{B} to your mana pool.
mc.printedText: Add {B}{B}{B} to your mana pool.

mc.oracleText: Haste (This creature can attack and {T} as soon as it comes under your control.)
mc.printedText: Haste (This creature may attack and {T} the turn it comes under your control.)
mc.flavorText: The giant was felt a few seconds before he was seen.

mc.name: Killer Whale
mc.oracleText: {U}: Killer Whale gains flying until end of turn.
mc.printedText: {U}: Killer Whale gains flying until end of turn.
mc.flavorText: Hunger is like the sea: deep, endless, and unforgiving.

mc.name: Sonic Burst
mc.oracleText:
As an additional cost to play Sonic Burst, discard a card at random.
Sonic Burst deals 4 damage to target creature or player.
mc.printedText:
As an additional cost to play Sonic Burst, discard a card at random from your hand.
Sonic Burst deals 4 damage to target creature or player.
mc.flavorText: Music scythes the savage beast.

mc.name: Crashing Boars
mc.oracleText: Whenever Crashing Boars attacks, defending player chooses an untapped creature he or she controls. That creature blocks Crashing Boars this turn if able.
mc.printedText: Whenever Crashing Boars attacks, defending player chooses an untapped creature he or she controls. That creature blocks Crashing Boars this turn if able.
mc.flavorText: Bores ruin a party. Boars are party to ruin.

mc.name: Gaseous Form
mc.oracleText:
Enchant creature
Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt to and dealt by enchanted creature.
mc.printedText: Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt to and dealt by enchanted creature.
mc.flavorText:
"It's hard to hurt anyone when you're as transparent as your motives."
--Ertai, wizard adept

Flying

Flying
{2}{U}: Untap Vigilant Drake.

Flying

mc.flavorText: Students who had seen Rayne argue with Urza were certain she had summoned it to make him seem warmer by comparison.

mc.name: Air Elemental
mc.oracleText: Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)
mc.printedText: Flying
mc.flavorText: As insubstantial, and as powerful, as the wind that carries it.

mc.name: Balduvian Horde
mc.oracleText: When Balduvian Horde comes into play, sacrifice it unless you discard a card at random.
mc.printedText: When Balduvian Horde comes into play, sacrifice it unless you discard a card at random from your hand.

mc.name: Skittering Horror
mc.oracleText: When you play a creature spell, sacrifice Skittering Horror.
mc.printedText: When you play a creature spell, sacrifice Skittering Horror.
mc.flavorText:
"This monstrosity will do--for now."
--Davvol, Evincar of Rath

mc.name: Fog Elemental

Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)
When Fog Elemental attacks or blocks, sacrifice it at end of combat.
mc.printedText:
Flying
When Fog Elemental attacks or blocks, sacrifice it at end of combat.
mc.flavorText:
"I've seen fog so thick you could cut it, but none that could cut me."
--Tahngarth of the Weatherlight

mc.oracleText: Counter target spell unless its controller pays {X}. If he or she doesn't, that player taps all lands he or she controls and empties his or her mana pool.
mc.printedText: Counter target spell unless its controller pays {X}. If he or she doesn't, that player taps all lands he or she controls and empties his or her mana pool.

mc.name: Terror
mc.oracleText: Destroy target nonartifact, nonblack creature. It can't be regenerated.
mc.printedText: Destroy target nonartifact, nonblack creature. It can't be regenerated.

mc.name: Fallen Angel
mc.oracleText:
Flying
Sacrifice a creature: Fallen Angel gets +2/+1 until end of turn.
mc.printedText:
Flying
Sacrifice a creature: Fallen Angel gets +2/+1 until end of turn.
mc.flavorText: "Angels are simply extensions of truth upon the fabric of life--and there is far more dark than light."Baron Sengir

mc.name: Plated Spider
mc.oracleText: Reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.)
mc.printedText: Plated Spider may block as though it had flying.
mc.flavorText: Most spiders wait patiently for their prey to arrive. Most spiders aren't forty feet tall.

mc.printedText: At the beginning of your upkeep, target non--Wall creature an opponent controls gains forestwalk until your next upkeep. (The creature is unblockable as long as defending player controls a forest.)

mc.name: Bone Harvest
mc.oracleText:
Put any number of target creature cards from your graveyard on top of your library.
Draw a card at the beginning of the next turn's upkeep.
mc.printedText:
Put any number of target creature cards from your graveyard on top of your library.
Draw a card at the beginning of the next turn's upkeep.
mc.flavorText:
"Only fools believe they will face my armies but once."
--Kaervek

mc.name: Brainstorm
mc.oracleText: Draw three cards, then put two cards from your hand on top of your library.
mc.printedText: Draw three cards, then put two cards from your hand on top of your library in any order.
mc.flavorText:
"I reeled from the blow, and then suddenly, I knew exactly what to do. Within moments victory was mine."
--Gustha Ebbasdotter
Kjeldoran royal mage

mc.name: Cloud Elemental
mc.oracleText:
Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)
Cloud Elemental can block only creatures with flying.
mc.printedText:
Flying
Cloud Elemental can block only creatures with flying.
mc.flavorText:
"You know you've angered the gods when the clouds turn against you."
--Sisay, Captain of the Weatherlight

mc.name: Coercion
mc.oracleText: Target opponent reveals his or her hand. Choose a card from it. That player discards that card.
mc.printedText: Look at target opponent's hand and choose a card from it. That player discards that card.
mc.flavorText:
"There's very little that escapes me, Greven. And you will escape very little if you fail."
--Volrath

mc.name: Crash of Rhinos
mc.oracleText: Trample
mc.printedText: Trample
mc.flavorText:
Love is like a rhino, short-sighted and hasty; if it cannot find a way, it will make a way.
--Femeref adage

mc.name: Deadly Insect
mc.oracleText: Shroud (This permanent can't be the target of spells or abilities.)
mc.printedText: Deadly Insect can't be the target of spells or abilities.
mc.flavorText: With his newfound sense of self-importance, Squee set his sights on ever-bigger bugs.

mc.name: Diabolic Edict
mc.oracleText: Target player sacrifices a creature.
mc.printedText: Target player sacrifices a creature.
mc.flavorText: Greven il-Vec lifted Vhati off his feet. "The fall will give you time to think on your failure."

mc.name: Gravedigger
mc.oracleText: When Gravedigger comes into play, you may return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.
mc.printedText: When Gravedigger comes into play, you may return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.
mc.flavorText: A full coffin is like a full coffer--both are attractive to thieves.

mc.name: Hollow Dogs
mc.oracleText: Whenever Hollow Dogs attacks, it gets +2/+0 until end of turn.
mc.printedText: Whenever Hollow Dogs attacks, it gets +2/+0 until end of turn.
mc.flavorText: A hollow dog is never empty. It is filled with thirst for the hunt.

mc.name: Lightning Bolt
mc.oracleText: Lightning Bolt deals 3 damage to target creature or player.
mc.printedText: Lightning Bolt deals 3 damage to target creature or player.

mc.name: Llanowar Elves
mc.oracleText: {T}: Add {G} to your mana pool.
mc.printedText: {T}: Add {G} to your mana pool.
mc.flavorText:
One bone broken for every twig snapped underfoot.
--Llanowar penalty for trespassing

mc.name: Lowland Giant
mc.flavorText: "Faugh" snorted Tahngarth. "Why would it make a meal of something like you?" Squee looked relieved. "No," he continued, "you'd make a much better toothpick."

mc.name: Raging Goblin
mc.oracleText: Haste (This creature can attack and {T} as soon as it comes under your control.)
mc.printedText: Haste (This creature may attack and {T} the turn it comes under your control.)
mc.flavorText: He raged at the world, at his family, at his life. But mostly he just raged.

mc.name: Rampant Growth
mc.oracleText: Search your library for a basic land card and put that card into play tapped. Then shuffle your library.
mc.printedText: Search your library for a basic land card and put that card into play tapped. Then shuffle your library.
mc.flavorText: Rath forces plants from its surface as one presses whey from cheese.

mc.name: Scaled Wurm
mc.flavorText:
"Flourishing during the Ice Age, these wurms were the bane of all Kjeldorans. Their great size and ferocity made them the subject of countless nightmares--they embodied the worst of the Ice Age."
--Kjeldor: Ice Civilization

mc.name: Skittering Skirge
mc.oracleText:
Flying
When you play a creature spell, sacrifice Skittering Skirge.
mc.printedText:
Flying
When you play a creature spell, sacrifice Skittering Skirge.
mc.flavorText: The imps' warbling cries echo through Phyrexia's towers like those of mourning doves in a cathedral.

mc.name: Snapping Drake
mc.oracleText: Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)
mc.printedText: Flying
mc.flavorText: Drakes claim to be dragons--until the dragons show up.

mc.name: Tolarian Winds
mc.oracleText: Discard all the cards in your hand, then draw that many cards.
mc.printedText: Discard your hand, then draw that many cards.
mc.flavorText: Afterward, Tolaria's winds were like the whispers of lost wizards, calling for life.

mc.name: Viashino Warrior
mc.flavorText:
"When traveling the Great Desert avoid wearing the scales of lizards, for the Viashino rule the sands and look poorly on the skinning of their cousins."
--Zhalfirin Guide to the Desert

mc.name: Wayward Soul
mc.oracleText:
Flying

{U}: Put Wayward Soul on top of its owner's library.
mc.printedText:
Flying
{U}: Put Wayward Soul on top of its owner's library.
mc.flavorText:
"no home no heart no hope"
--Stronghold graffito

mc.name: Thunderbolt
mc.oracleText: Choose one - Thunderbolt deals 3 damage to target player; or Thunderbolt deals 4 damage to target creature with flying.
mc.printedText: Choose one Thunderbolt deals 3 damage to target player; or Thunderbolt deals 4 damage to target creature with flying.
mc.flavorText:
"Most wizards consider a thunderbolt to be a proper retort."
--Ertai, wizard adept

mc.name: Woolly Spider
mc.oracleText:
Reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.)
Whenever Woolly Spider blocks a creature with flying, Woolly Spider gets +0/+2 until end of turn.
mc.printedText:
Woolly Spider may block as though it had flying.
Whenever Woolly Spider blocks a creature with flying, Woolly Spider gets +0/+2 until end of turn.
mc.flavorText:
"We need not fear the forces of the air; I've yet to see a spider without an appetite."
--Taaveti of Kelsinko, elvish hunter

mc.name: Feral Shadow
mc.oracleText: Flying
mc.printedText: Flying
mc.flavorText:
"The nightstalkers are such a minor power in Urborg. Their sad eagerness to elevate themselves makes them willing tools in the plundering of little Femeref."
--Kaervek
